To create a show, place a show platform in a tank containing show animals, or place a show platform in a tank that connects to another one with show animals in it. Place grandstands to face the show tank, and then start scheduling tricks!
To find out about a specific show or a tank object, click the show name or tank object in the list on the left.

The MC, or master of ceremonies, hosts marine shows from the show platform. Animals, like the California sea lion, perform their tricks on it. Place a show platform in a tank to create a show, and then, click the show platform to open the Show Scheduler.
Complete two marine show challenges in Challenge mode to unlock the big-screen TV for your show platform. Complete the Marine Shows campaign to unlock the colorful upgraded show platform with canopy.

Grandstands give guests a comfortable place to sit when watching marine shows. Guests in grandstands enjoy the show much more.
The small grandstand seats two guests, the medium grandstand seats four, and the large grandstand seats six.

Upgraded grandstands add color and comfort to show areas. Win the Show Donation Level 1 Award to unlock the medium upgraded grandstand. Win the Show Donation Level 2 Award to unlock the large upgraded grandstand.

Tank lights illuminate the water inside marine tanks. You can also use them to light murky benthic or wetlands exhibits.
The tank light is available for purchase after winning the Show Tycoon Level 1 Award.

Tank portals connect marine show tanks to regular exhibit tanks. Show animals cannot live all the time in a show tank. You must create an exhibit tank for show animals to live in when they finish performing. Place an exhibit tank adjacent to a show tank and connect them with a tank portal. When it's time for a show, animals travel from the exhibit tank to the show tank via the tank portal.
Training areas are used for training marine animals tricks to perform in marine shows. You must place a training area and a tank entrance in a tank to train the animals in it.
Animals in marine shows perform in trick areas. To move a trick area, select the trick area and then move it to the desired location.
Animals such as the Pacific walrus and California sea lion perform on trick platforms. To move a trick platform, select the trick platform and then move it to the desired location.
